posts.name: Anchorage attorney withdraws from federal judge nomination
posts.text: The Anchorage attorney nominated by President Donald Trump to be a federal judge on the U.S. District Court for Alaska has withdrawn from his nomination.

posts.name: Trump lawyer denounces ‘excesses’ of Romania’s anti-corruption efforts – EURACTIV.com
posts.text: US President Donald Trump’s lawyer, Rudy Giuliani, has written a letter to Romania’s president, accusing the Eastern European country’s anticorruption efforts of going too far and calling for amnesty for those already prosecuted and convicted.
